title: Microphone did not working when i call with my speakerphone
content:
The other party can't hear me when i put my calls on speaker, but as soon as i turned it off, they can hear me again.

i already try this on safe mode but the problem persist.

i already delete cache and data on all my apps, and even reset it to factory mode but they still can't hear me.

pls help :(
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
